name: Duelist Mod
description:
A Slay the Spire adaptation of Yu-Gi-Oh!

SOURCE
 https://github.com/adambennett/StS-DuelistMod 

PATCH NOTES
v1.203.7
- Fixed Superheavy Blue Brawler+ bug
- Hane Hane summons a token now instead of itself (for clarity)
- Most starting decks now have special Millennium Puzzle effects
- Fixed Dragon Capture Jar and Toon Briefcase bug
- Fixed Millennium Ring, Millennium Key
- Fixed max summons not resetting on game resets
- Fixed starting deck bug that was not adding cards properly sometimes
- Fixed Card Set option right arrow bug

v1.203.6
- Fixed Tomb Pilferer power infinite loop bug


Thanks for playing the Duelist! Please let me know if you have any feedback or bug reports!
Email: nyoxidestsmods@gmail.com
